items.title: Democratic senators call for insider trading investigation of White House
With many career lawyers gone, Justice Dept. hires Trump loyalists for court
items.description: The Justice Department is building a roster of lawyers willing to defend in court the most controversial parts of President Donald Trump’s agenda.
